Copy remote mysql database to localhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/copy-remote-mysql-database-to-local/Thu, 01 Jun 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/copy-remote-mysql-database-to-local/ssh -C fatty@db.jeffsmithdev.com "mysqldump -uroot -pPass xxxxx" | mysql -uroot -pPass xxxxxx
